https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zpYtKU31ix7lyDRMOhIg3jldrK3.jpg Boy meets girl in the escalator of a Berlin metro station. The boy decides to give love a chance and runs after the girl but she is nowhere to be found. Then the city of Berlin starts giving him signs where to go. Alright Love
